PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 due to NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock.
Impella insertion on 09/21/2024 and removal on 09/27/2024.
Extubated on 09/28/2024; re-intubated the same day due to airway protection.
Remains critically ill with fluctuating clinical parameters.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024, condition stable but with guarded prognosis.

InfectionIndicators.LowBloodPressure: SBP recorded between 70-100 mmHg during A-fib management

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Fever and leukocytosis noted, concerns about possible sepsis without a known source.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Blood transfusion administered to maintain hemoglobin above 8.
